::: Megatron greets Shredder by a covert loading bay where he brought the 
pod. If he had brought it in the front door Hell Beast and his lacky's would 
have spotted it. :::

::: Megatron ::: The pod has arrived! Excellent! Scorpinox will have to 
select a powerful beast mode for it. Now, bring it into my quarters, its my 
temporary H.Q.

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Hell Beast, on the brdge and giving orders looks to Jackle and Black 
Aracnia who were on the systems. The fembot turned to him. :::

::: Black Aracnia ::: Hell Beast, im getting a Predacon signiture in the back 
of the ship, but its not registered.

::: Hell Beast gave a slow frown ::: wheres Megatron?

::: Jackle, already loading his pistol ::: I'll be more than happy to find 
him.

OOC: I hope Inferno, or anyone else minds, but I would like to mode Inferno 
and Rampage while hes gone. I wont kill them or damage them.

::: Inferno, in his beast mode lunges forward and knocks Jackle onto the 
floor ::: I shall find Megatron for the Royalty! You will remain here!

::: Hell Beast ::: Inferno, Jackle, come with me. Rampage, watch the 
computers with Black Aracnia.

::: Rampage opened his tired, painful eyes and with his brimstone voice 
replied, ::: As you wish, Commander. Dont get shot in the back or anything.

::: Hell Beast narrowed his eyes at the moody crab, but moved out with gun in 
hand to find Megatron. :::

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Inferno took it apon himself to check Megatron's quarters first. With his 
flame thrower in hand, he sneaked down the ahll, stopping and looking in all 
directions with his insanity. He came up to the double sliding doors and ever 
so slightly knocked and then put his audio reciver up to it to listen. :::

::: Inferno ::: Come out, come out......Open the door in the name of the 
Royalty!
